name: HelloBabySmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn on light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Through HelloBaby Smart APP, Help you to easily connect smart devices and realize the interconnection of smart devices.
Supports voice-controlled smart devices such as Alexa for easy control, such as:
You can control the lights in your home by voice, such as:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”,
”Alexa, turn on light”.
